sentences.sContent: With a few exceptions, the technique for building a skyscraper is similar whether you are in Europe or you are in Singapore.
sentences.sContent_eng: With a few exceptions, the technique for building a skyscraper is similar whether you are in Europe or you are in Singapore.
sentences.sCn: 除了少数特例外，不管是在欧洲还是新加坡，建造一幢摩天楼的技术大体上是相似的。

sentences.sContent: He talks of building a "digital skyscraper, " a company whose services are so indispensable that someday we will look back and wonder how we managed to do without it.
sentences.sContent_eng: He talks of building a "digital skyscraper, " a company whose services are so indispensable that someday we will look back and wonder how we managed to do without it.
sentences.sCn: 他谈到要建立一座“数字摩天楼”，其服务是如此不可或缺，以至于会有那么一天，我们将怀疑没有它到底还能做什么。

sentences.sContent: "However, given high costs of building skyscrapers and maintaining them as well as environmental problems they cause, government should be cautious in approving skyscraper projects, " he said.
sentences.sContent_eng: "However, given high costs of building skyscrapers and maintaining them as well as environmental problems they cause, government should be cautious in approving skyscraper projects, " he said.
sentences.sCn: 然而，考虑到摩天楼的高造价和高维护费用，以及由此引起的环境问题，政府应谨慎批准摩天楼项目。

remMethod.val: sky(天) + scrape(摩擦) + er(表人或物) → 楼高得可以擦到天 → 摩天楼

trans.tranOther: a very tall modern city building
